titleInfo.title: Letter No. 38 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Factors at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter reports that Reis Bagur Cahn [Ra'is Baqer Khan] and his men departed Bushire and restored power to Sheikh Sadoon after Abdul Fatee Cahn [Abdol-Fath Khan, Karim Khan's eldest son] had commanded him to do so. Events following this are described in detail. The letter also reports developments from Schyras [Shiraz] where Abdul Fatee Cahn (with the support of Sadoo Cahn [Sadiq Khan]) is said to enjoy as much power as Carem Cahn [Karim Khan] did previously. Shipped by Cossid via Bunderick [Bandar-e Rig].
